definitions.definition: The act of a character speaking to themselves so as to reveal their thoughts to the audience .
examples: At the end of the second act the main villain gave a soliloquy detailing his plans to attack the protagonist.

definitions.definition: A speech or written discourse in this form.

main_definition: ( drama ) The act of a character speaking to themselves so as to reveal their thoughts to the audience .
secondary_definitions: ( authorship ) A speech or written discourse in this form.
